body.p: Be sure to check out the new Graphics section and our new "Powered by Gentoo Linux" logo. Developers will also be interested in Grant Goodyear's new User-Mode Linux Guide. Like VMWare, User-Mode Linux will allow you to run a virtual Linux system on your PC. But unlike VMWare, User-Mode Linux is free :) Also, a new version 1.9 of keychain (a ssh-agent manager) has been released. Enjoy! Work on Gentoo Linux 1.0 continues to go well.
